answer:
<p>I think that you can't control this. If the user had setup their browser to open links in a new window, you can't force this to open links in a new tab.</p>

<p><a href="https://stackoverflow.com/questions/726761/javascript-open-in-a-new-window-not-tab">JavaScript open in a new window, not tab</a></p>
data.title: Open a URL in a new tab (and not a new window)
